thread.title: TOPS Software Announces Call for Speakers for CAMfire Conference
thread.title_full: TOPS Software Announces Call for Speakers for CAMfire Conference

author: Andrea Drennen
title: TOPS Software Announces Call for Speakers for CAMfire Conference
text:
TOPS Software announced today an open call for the 2016 CAMfire Conference, to be held in Orlando February 3-5. Interested speakers are invited to submit topic idea summaries for sessions that will deliver engaging, helpful and relevant presentations to community association professionals. The CAMfire Conference is being held in Orlando, Florida on February 3rd through 5th 2016. As many as 500 professionals who serve condominium, co-op and homeowners associations are expected to attend the event. The CAMfire Conference is hosted by TOPS Software, makers of TOPS Community Association Management software. Michael Hardy, President of TOPS Software explains the purpose for the conference: "Our goal is an event that brings TOPS users and CAM professionals together to INFORM attendees about CAM industry trends, INSPIRE them to be a positive force, and IGNITE in them a passion to serve."
The 2016 conference will be the third CAMfire event since its inception in 2014. Past events have featured highly respected industry speakers for both keynotes and conference sessions. The 2016 event is shaping up to be the most ambitious to date, with over 40 sessions in 5 different tracks.
Speakers interested in pitching a session are invited to do so at http://www.camfire-conference.com/submit-presentation.html
ABOUT THE CAMFIRE CONFERENCE
The CAMfire Conference provides an open and engaging environment for all Community Association Management professionals. More than a TOPS Software User Conference, CAMfire features general CAM industry sessions and keynotes delivered by industry thought leaders. Learn more about the CAMfire Conference at http://www.camfire-conference.com
ABOUT TOPS SOFTWARE
TOPS Software, the leader in Condominium and HOA management software solutions, is committed to bringing the best products and services to the community association management industry. TOPS products are used by thousands of organizations to manage millions of homes across the United States. Learn more about TOPS at http://www.topssoft.com .
